product_description.title: Forum Low Shoes
product_description.text: Combine the classic adidas Forum Low shoes with a gum bottom and you've got yourself a guaranteed success. The era-defining silhouette instantly connects you to the '80s with the unforgettable X-ankle detail and 3-Stripes. Whether you choose to lock in the strap or let it loose, style is not compromised.
product_description.subtitle: An archival basketball shoe showing off timeless style.

product_description.title: Forum Exhibit Low Shoes
product_description.text: The adidas Forum shoes have long been a recognizable silhouette. The X detail on the side especially makes sure their presence is immediately known. So what would the Forum look like if, instead of the usual design, we built it from the outside in? Well, it would look like this  still the same expressiveness as the OG Forum, just with flipped materials that bring in new texture and energy.
product_description.subtitle: Forum Low shoes with a mellow vibe, made in part with recycled content.
usps: Suede and textile details on synthetic leather upper
25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content

product_highlights.copy: Generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
product_highlights.headline: Helping to reduce the use of virgin materials

product_highlights.copy: The X-detail stays true to the OG basketball icon.
product_highlights.headline: X marks the spot

product_highlights.copy: A rubber outsole provides outstanding grip and a sleek, low-profile look.
product_highlights.headline: Rubber outsole

product_description.title: Forum Low Shoes
product_description.text:
After turning heads on the hardwood back in the '80s, the adidas Forum walked out the stadium doors and made an impression everywhere else. Fashion. Music. Your closet. Step into the legacy with this low top pair. Its layered leather upper and ankle strap flash clear hoops DNA. But modern details keep things fresh. 

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
product_description.subtitle: Low top shoes with B-ball DNA made in part with recycled content.
usps: Lace closure with adjustable hook-and-loop strap
25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content

product_description.title: Rivalry Low Basketball Shoes
product_description.text: A heritage design with a touch of modern style. The adidas Rivalry Low Shoes blend iconic details with a sleek leather build. Whether paired with joggers for a casual meetup or jeans for a night out, the clean lines and subtle 3-Stripes branding make a statement. A textile lining and rubber outsole provide lasting comfort so you can focus on creating off-court memories in these storied sneakers.

product_description.title: Rivalry Low Shoes
product_description.text: The adidas Rivalry earned its stripes on the hardwood and then became an icon among punks and skaters. Today, the legendary sneaker is poised to dominate daily life. Add it to your everyday rotation and revel in the '80s nostalgia with a soft synthetic and leather upper, classic cupsole and terry lining. All the prestige of the beloved OG pair is here.
product_description.subtitle: The prestigious '80s B-ball sneaker returns for daily life.

product_description.title: Superstar 82 Shoes
product_description.text: There's a reason the adidas Superstar shoe became the icon that it is today  it can be reinvented by everyone who wears it. Basketball players made their mark in the shoe first, but it wasn't long before musicians and sneakerheads caught on. This pair shows love for the legend with attention to small details. Premium leather pairs with canvas in honor of '80s basketball. The rubber shell toe is the mark of an icon.
product_description.subtitle: Authentic adidas shoes rooted in '80s basketball.

product_description.title: Response CL Shoes
product_description.text: These adidas shoes have all the easygoing essence of a "dad" shoe. The chunky silhouette and stitched suede overlays speak to today's retro revival. The fit is as fresh as the look, with a lightweight EVA midsole so each step is effortless.
product_description.subtitle: These '00s-inspired shoes support your stride and your style.

product_description.title: Superstar 82 Shoes
product_description.text: These adidas Superstar 82 Shoes honor the original and stay true to the retro shape and proportions, including the iconic rubber shell toe and cupsole. A textured leather upper takes these sneakers to a new dimension with a superior focus on design and craftsmanship. You'll feel extra comfortable thanks to the soft, premium sockliner. Upgrade your off-duty style with this fresh take on adidas heritage.
product_description.subtitle: adidas Superstar shoes that throw it back to 1982.

product_description.title: Superstar Shoes
product_description.text: The adidas Superstar shoes have stood the test of time. Originally made for basketball, adopted by hip hop royalty, now a streetwear staple. The iconic shell toe remains, a signature style and protection feature. Slip into a piece of sneaker history. The smooth leather upper and rubber outsole provide a classic look and durable comfort. Wear them when you're on the go or at the gym, the Superstars keep your style game strong. Their sporty roots and retro appeal make them an everyday icon for any sneakerhead's rotation. Stay fresh in a shoe that's forever in fashion. The adidas Superstar, always a legend.
product_description.subtitle: A premium edition of a classic shoe, brimming with confident style.

product_description.title: Handball Spezial Shoes
product_description.text: Smoke struts into the spotlight. Step into the shoes born to dominate concrete courts, the Handball Spezial. The low-profile legend flexes a reimagined look with perforated leather uppers in tonal gray. Embrace the game-changing traction and control that made these shoes famous among soccer players and set the pace off the field. Comfort reigns supreme with a texture lining and rubber soles underfoot. Victory is calling. Lace up and answer.
product_description.subtitle: Sleek adidas sneakers in perforated leather.

product_description.title: Superstar 82 Shoes
product_description.text:
Pop on these adidas Superstar shoes, and you've got instant confidence with every stride. Signature 3-Stripes frame perforated detail in a wash of muted color that coordinates with the heel tab. The crisp upper is made with recycled and vegan materials, giving you an animal-free option for the classic look you love. A rubber outsole rounds out the silhouette for sleek style and a solid grip. 

To reduce our reliance on virgin materials, we make sure that our vegan alternatives also contain a minimum of 25% recycled content.
product_description.subtitle: The iconic shoe in neutral shades, made with recycled and vegan materials.
usps: Vegan alternative: At least 25% recycled content

product_description.title: Superstar 82 Shoes
product_description.text: The adidas Superstar shoes changed the game on the hardwood, made history in hip hop and then went on to take the world of fashion by storm. Today, you see them on every continent and in every country and city around the globe. Honoring their legacy, this pair revives the proportions of a beloved '80s pair. From the rubber outsole to the shell toe, every detail is totally authentic.
product_description.subtitle: An '80s version of the beloved adidas Superstar shoe returns.
